caption.p: Spatiotemporal changes in the cotton sowing ( a), emergence ( b), squaring ( c), flowering ( d), boll opening ( e), and harvest ( f) dates across the North China Plain from 1981 to 2012. Green and red circles represent the trends of the phenological date. Black pentagrams represent the trends at the stations, with a significance level of 0.05. Maps were generated using ArcGIS 10.1 (ESRI Inc, Redlands, CA, USA, http://www.esri.com/).
